title: INDRAY MANDEHA

verses.1:
He sambatra 'reo olon'afaka,
Navela noho ny rà latsaka;
Afak'isika, voavonjy re
Vaotra indray mandeha
verses.2:
Tsy meloka intsony isika,
Novonjen'i Jeso tanteraka;
Nantsoiny isika mantsy hoe:
Mba ho Azy indray mandeha
verses.3:
Endrey izany voninahiny,
F'izay Azy dia voatahiriny,
Novelominy tokoa ka he!
Afaka indray mandeha!

chorus:
Indray mandeha ihany re Jeso
Ry mpanota sy rahalahy ô!
No voahombo hisolo anao;
Indray mandeha ho avotra.
